TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartZone extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase

summary.span: 作為在網頁上裝載 控制項之網頁組件控制項集合中的主要控制項。

span.span: Serves as the primary control in the Web Parts control set for hosting controls on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 組件功能中，區域是定義在網頁上包含 Web 組件控制項區域。In the Web Parts feature, a zone is a defined region on a Web page that contains Web Parts controls. 區域的主要功能是它包含，控制項的版面配置設定，並為這些控制項提供常見的使用者介面 (UI)。The primary functions of a zone are to lay out the controls it contains, and to provide a common user interface (UI) for those controls. 如需區域以及如何在 Web 組件的應用程式中使用它們的一般資訊，請參閱參考文件，基底並類別，以及主題[Web 組件控制集概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668)。For general information about zones and how they are used in Web Parts applications, see the reference documentation for the base and classes, and the topic entitled [Web Parts Control Set Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ff0149e4-695a-401a-8cda-53df6d7d2668). 特殊函式控制項是包含形成主要 UI 的 Web 組件應用程式的控制項。The special function of the control is to contain controls, which form the main UI of Web Parts applications. A控制項可以在網頁上，讓開發人員使用它做為範本，並將新增在其他伺服器控制項宣告保存格式``項目。A control can be declared in persistence format on a Web page, enabling developers to use it as a template and to add other server controls within the `` element. 伺服器控制項，如果加入的任何型別區域，可以當做控制項在執行階段。Any type of server control, if added to a zone, can function as a control at run time. 這是不論是否加入的控制項，則為 true控制項、 使用者控制項、 自訂控制項或 ASP.NET 控制項。This is true regardless of whether the added control is a control, a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題類別。For more information, see the topic for the class. 除了包含控制項，控制項也提供常見的 UI，它所包含的控制項。Besides containing controls, a control also provides a common UI for the controls it contains. 此常見的 UI，統稱為 chrome 中，是由所有控制項，例如框線、 標題、 標頭和頁尾、 樣式特性和動詞命令 （的 UI 動作，使用者可以在控制項上執行，例如關閉或最小化） 的週邊 UI 項目所組成。This common UI, known collectively as chrome, consists of the peripheral UI elements on all the controls, such as the border, title, header and footer, style characteristics, and verbs (UI actions that a user can carry out on a control, such as close or minimize). > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能會呈現的高度或其包含的控制項，以非預期的方式，根據區域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件或屬性。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 類別衍生自基底的其行為的大部分並類別; 它會新增一個唯一的成員，屬性。The class derives most of its behavior from the base and classes; it adds only one unique member, the property. 這個屬性會參考物件，也就是範本，讓網頁程式開發人員使用以靜態方式定義控制項的區域中``.aspx 頁面的宣告式標記中的項目。This property references an object, which is a template that allows page developers to define the controls in a zone statically by using a `` element in the declarative markup of an .aspx page. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記，也可能不符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用Web 組件頁面中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control in a Web Parts page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 此範例的第一部分顯示的自訂類別，繼承自類別，建構函式中設定兩個基底的區域屬性。The first part of the example shows a custom class that inherits from the class, and that sets two of the base zone properties in the constructor. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)] 此範例的第二部分會顯示包含自訂的頁面控制項。The second part of the example shows a page that contains the custom control. 請注意頁面需要特殊`Register`指示詞來參考該組件包含自訂的區域頁面頂端附近。Notice that the page requires a special `Register` directive near the top of the page to reference the assembly that contains the custom zone. 這個頁面也包含``項目，這每個 Web 組件頁面上的必要條件。The page also contains an `` element, which is required on every Web Parts page. ``項目，這表示自訂控制項，包含標準 ASP.NET控制項。The `` element, which represents the custom control, contains a standard ASP.NET control. 因為它包含內區域中，控制項將會以包裝控制項在執行階段，這可讓它做為控制項。Because it is contained within a zone, the control will be wrapped with a control at run time, which enables it to act as a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#1)] 檢查自訂宣告式標記控制項。Examine the declarative markup for the custom control. 請注意，您還可以設定各種不同的區域層級屬性，在標記中，如下列程式碼範例所示。Notice that you can set various zone-level properties in the markup, as shown in the following code example. > [!NOTE] > 務必要注意使用``項目。It is very important to note the use of the `` element. 如 < 備註 > 一節所述則需要這個元素內區域，以包裝靜態頁面中宣告的控制項。This element, as described in the Remarks section, is required within a zone to wrap the static controls that are declared in a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是預設建構函式，而且未設定任何值。The method is a default constructor and does not set any values. 不過，在衍生的類別也可以使用建構函式，來設定基底的區域屬性，來建立標準的行為和自訂的區域控制項的外觀。However, derived classes can use the constructor to set base zone properties, to create standard behaviors and appearance for a custom zone control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在自訂建構函式使用類別來設定數個區域的基底屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of a constructor on a custom class to set several base properties for the zone. 這種方法可能會很有用，如果您想要建立自訂有特定的行為和外觀的控制項。This approach could be useful if you want to create a custom control that has specific behaviors and appearance. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼範例中，包括自訂類別及裝載控制項，.aspx 頁面類別概觀主題。The full code for the example, including both the custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/mywebpartzone.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/mywebpartzone.vb#3)]

Protected Friend Overrides Function GetInitialWebParts () As WebPartCollection

summary.span: 覆寫抽象基底方法，並取得區域樣板中包含的最初靜態 控制項組。

span.span: Overrides the abstract base method and gets the initial set of static controls contained within the zone's template.

returns.span: ，包含區域樣板中所包含的所有 或其他伺服器控制項。

span.span: A that contains all the or other server controls contained in the zone's template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作的抽象基底方法。The method provides an implementation of the abstract base method. 基底方法，不提供任何實作，但宣告方法，讓衍生的類別可以自訂如何，他們將會在區域中，取得一組初始的所屬的控制項未考慮到帳戶的個人化變更。The base method provides no implementation, but declares the method so that derived classes can customize how they will get the initial set of controls that belong in a zone, without taking personalization changes into account. 在區域中，找到每個伺服器控制項呼叫方法。For each server control found in the zone, the method is called. 如果控制項直接繼承自類別，它只會加入到該區域集合 (和類似的集合控制項)。If a control inherits directly from the class, it is simply added to the zone's collection (and to the similar collection of the control). 如果控制項不會直接從繼承，Web 組件控制集包裝控制項與物件，可讓控制項做控制項在執行階段。If a control does not inherit directly from , the Web Parts control set wraps the control with a object, which enables the control to behave as a control at run time. 類別會實作基底方法 （如果有的話），傳回一組控制項內的一組靜態宣告``中的 Web 組件頁面標記的標記。The class implements the base method by returning the set of controls (if any) that are statically declared within a set of `` tags in the markup of a Web Parts page. 如果控制宣告區域中，子控制項的控制項已加入，而不是控制項本身。If a control is declared in a zone, the child controls of that control are added, rather than the control itself. 此實作可讓您，例如，建立在主版頁面中，區域，，然後將宣告個別或內容頁面中的伺服器控制項。This implementation allows you to, for example, create a zone in a master page, and then declare individual or server controls in a content page. 如果您宣告中的控制項區域，則會予以忽略。If you declare controls in a zone, they are ignored. > [!NOTE] > 所傳回的控制項的初始集合方法可能會不同於實際的執行階段集合，在區域中，控制項的個人化之後。The initial collection of controls returned by the method might be different from the actual run-time collection of controls in a zone, after personalization has taken place. 例如，假設您有具有兩個網頁控制項，以及第一個包含使用者控制項，名為`User1`靜態宣告內``標記。For example, suppose you have a Web page with two controls, and the first one contains user control named `User1` that is statically declared within the `` tags. 如果使用者在載入頁面和拖曳`User1`至第二個區域，然後`User1`仍然是藉由呼叫傳回集合的一部分方法的第一個區域中，因為它宣告為該區域中。If a user loads the page and drags `User1` into the second zone, then `User1` is still part of the collection that is returned by calling the method for the first zone, because it is declared in that zone. 但在執行階段，當控制項的個人化資料載入，`User1`實際上不會顯示在這裡使用者拖曳它的第二個區域中。But at run time, when the control loads the personalization data, `User1` actually appears in the second zone where the user dragged it.

summary.span: 覆寫基底方法，表示已使用 控制項順利註冊該區域。

span.span: Overrides the base method to indicate that the zone has successfully been registered with the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定 執行個體的參考，該執行個體包含 Web 網頁標記中宣告的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to an instance that contains the controls declared in the markup of a Web page.
An that contains the controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是指執行個體控制項。The property refers to an instance within a control. 範本包含您可以宣告內的靜態的伺服器控制項控制項，包括控制項、 使用者控制項、 自訂控制項和 ASP.NET 控制項。The template contains static server controls that you can declare within a control, including controls, user controls, custom controls, and ASP.NET controls. 當您新增靜態或其他伺服器控制項能夠在網頁上的宣告式標記中，您必須將一組內的控制項的標記``標記。When you add static or other server controls to a in the declarative markup of a Web page, you must place the tags for the controls within a pair of `` tags. 如果您未宣告中的控制項``標記，擲回例外狀況。If you do not declare the controls within `` tags, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用在 Web 組件頁面的宣告式標記的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property in the declarative markup of a Web Parts page. 中的範例 > 一節找到完整的程式碼範例中，包括自訂類別和.aspx 頁面，以裝載該控制項，類別概觀主題。The full code for the example, including a custom class and an .aspx page to host the control, is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 請注意，在標記控制項，還有``元素，其中包含月曆控制項的參考。Notice that, in the markup for the control, there is a `` element that contains a reference to the Calendar control. 如果您想要加入其他控制項或其他伺服器控制項的區域，您也可以加入內``標記。If you wanted to add additional controls or other server controls to the zone, you could also add them within the `` tags. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/CS/webpartzonecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZone_Overview/VB/webpartzonevb.aspx#2)]

exception.span: 已完成區域中 控制項的註冊。

span.span: Registration of the controls in the zone is already complete.
